Actions.Name: Execute Action
Actions.Description: Performs a XOG operation with the parameters and field mappings provided

Actions.Name: Run Query
Actions.Description: Returns a list of all the records provided by the NSQL Query. Allows users to filter by the NSQL parameters and use all columns as part of the response.

Actions.Name: Validate Lookup
Actions.Description: Returns the lookup values for the parameters provided. Allows to validate a single value by ID or Label, or retrieve the list of all available values
